channel.title: Intro Elevator, Annoying Bug.
channel.description:
During the intro and the first LOADING message if you crouch just before the load happens you can get clipped into the chair/elevator. After every LOADING screen after you get clipped further downwards until you get off the elevator... Through the bottom of the floor which will kill you. I had to make a new file after that. I posted the pictures of the bug into this imgur album
ALBUM: [url]https://imgur.com/a/52Kew[/url]
